name: GURB
description:
I made this game for https://itch.io/jam/great-spring-game-jam-2021. The theme was "spring." There was an optional mechanic of "constant growth." Flowers will grow at random intervals. The player character will grow when eating the gubs, The gubs will grow when they eat. 

The goal is to survive as long as possible. 

I'm looking for ideas to expand on this game. Please let me know if you have any ideas or suggestions.
